nodes.text: Brother was a title given to all members of the Nightbrothers, a society of male Dathomirian Zabrak subservient to the Nightsisters.
On the misty world of Dathomir, the title of "Brother" was used, regardless of actual kinship, as a form of address for a Nightbrother, alone or followed by his first name.
This title first appeared in January 2011 in "Monster," the thirteenth episode of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series' third season.
